ol.li: SHALL contain [1..1] moodCode, where its data type is ActMood
SHALL contain [1..*] id, where its data type is II
SHALL contain [1..1] statusCode/@code = "completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20.15 ProcedureStatusCode STATIC 20061017), where its data type is CS
SHOULD contain [0..1] effectiveTime, where its data type is IVL_TS
SHALL contain [1..1] code, where its data type is CD
[CCD] SHALL contain [1..1] moodCode, where its data type is ActMood
[CCD] SHALL contain [1..*] id, where its data type is II
[CCD] SHALL contain [1..1] statusCode/@code = "completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20.15 ProcedureStatusCode STATIC 20061017), where its data type is CS
[CCD] SHOULD contain [0..1] effectiveTime, where its data type is IVL_TS
[CCD] SHALL contain [1..1] code, where its data type is CD
